mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_id AS alarmId, at.alarm_type_name AS alarmTypeName, a.user_id AS userId, a.actor_id AS actorId, a.article_id AS articleId, a.comment_id AS commentId, a.is_read, a.created_at AS createdAt, a.read_at AS readAt FROM ALARM a JOIN ALARM_TYPE at ON a.alarm_type_id = at.alarm_type_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
